manager_title: Task Manager for aria2 over JSON-RPC
tips_aria2_down_dir: Set the directory to store the downloaded files
tips_aria2_file_alloc: Pre-allocate disk space to reduce fragmentation (may slow down start-up)
tips_aria2_disk_cache: Set disk cache to reduce disk I/O
tips_aria2_overwrite: Allow new downloads to overwrite files that already exist
tips_aria2_max_concurrent: Set the maximum number of parallel downloads for every queue item
tips_aria2_max_download: Set the maximum download speed for all concurrent tasks
tips_aria2_max_upload: Set the maximum upload speed for all concurrent tasks
tips_aria2_http_wait: Set the interval time between retries (SEC)
tips_aria2_http_split: Set the maximum download sections of each download
tips_aria2_http_size: Set the minimum size of each download section
tips_aria2_http_connection: Set the maximum number of connections to one server for each download.
tips_aria2_http_ua: Set user agent for HTTP(S) downloads
tips_aria2_bt_port: Set the listening port for DHT and UDP tracker
tips_aria2_bt_peers: Set the maximum peers of each BitTorrent download
tips_aria2_bt_dht: Enable the DHT network for peer discovery in BitTorrent downloads
tips_aria2_bt_dht6: Enable the DHT network over IPv6 for peer discovery in BitTorrent downloads
tips_aria2_bt_follow: When a ".torrent" file is downloaded, start the BitTorrent download automatically
tips_aria2_bt_remove: Remove all unselected files when BitTorrent is completed
tips_aria2_bt_ratio: Set the share ratio of each BitTorrent download
tips_aria2_bt_seed: Set the share time of each BitTorrent download (MIN)
